description: Millions of insurance-holders have cancelled their insurance cover this year, instead choosing to put money aside each month as the cost of living crisis worsens

title: Tributes pour in for MoS Gambols cartoonist Roger Mahoney following his death at 89
description: Tributes have been paid to The Mail on Sunday's Gambols cartoonist Roger Mahoney, who has died aged 89. His weekly cartoon strip The Gambols entertained readers with a comical look into suburbia.

title: Number of US submarines off UK's coast have DOUBLED this year to ward off Russians
description: Double the usual number of Nato submarines have been spotted on the surface of the Clyde recently, heading to and from the key Faslane naval base 40 miles from Glasgow.

title: Post-Thanksgiving chaos as hundreds of flights are set to be impacted by storms and powerful winds
description: With everyone trying to get back home to return to work, wind advisories are set for about nine million people in the southeast, including Louisiana, where a tornado was confirmed Saturday.

title: Tinder Swindler victim goes on dating show to reignite her love life
description: Cecilie Fjellhoy was one of countless women defrauded by Hayut, who posed as the son of a Russian-Israeli diamond mogul on the dating app.

title: Boy, 15, convicted of running a 'county lines' drug-smuggling operation while living in care homes
description: A teenager living in care homes has been convicted of running a 'county lines' drugs network supplying heroin and cocaine worth hundreds of thousands of pounds.

title: Dan Andrews responds to Peta Credlin claim he only wanted to win Victorian election to get a statue
description: Daniel Andrews has denied claims that the only reason he led Labor to a third straight election was so if he won he could have a statue of him erected early next year outside his government office.

title: Women left in agony by 18-month gynaecology waiting list on the NHS
description: More than 40,000 women have been waiting for more than a year to see a gynaecologist. Among them are almost 5,000 patients who have been on the waiting list for more than 18 months.

title: I'm A Celebrity 2022: Jill Scott 'to earn millions from TV and endorsement deals'
description: Jill Scott, 35, is reportedly set to earn millions after proving popular with I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! viewers.

title: ALEXANDRA SHULMAN'S NOTEBOOK: The big issue in Qatar: Just what is in the WAGs' bags?
description: ALEXANDRA SHULMAN: At a time when there is relentless downbeat news, the football - despite being controversially hosted in Qatar - has come along as a mightily welcome distraction.

title: Passenger Salutes Hitler Calls For Race War Before American Airlines Flight Dallas Nicholas Letney
description: An airline passenger has been caught on camera  screaming Nazi slurs at passengers at the Seattle airport. Nicholas Letney, 31, shouted racial slurs and performed a Nazi salute.

title: Stalkers are using Amazon Alexa devices to terrorise victims, experts warn
description: The gadgets, which are voice activated and used to activate devices such as light controls or to play music, are being hijacked by vindictive ex-partners, who know the password or by using an app.

title: I'm A Celebrity 2022: Mike Tindall is the EIGHTH star to be eliminated
description: The former rugby player, 44, was the latest star to be booted out of the Australian jungle, after the four celebrities took on the iconic Cyclone trial.

title: England fans nearly riot at World Cup screening as TV on wrong channel for 30 minutes
description: Fuming England fans 'nearly rioted' last night as 'technical issues' at a screening meant they missed almost 30 minutes of the Three Lions' disappointing match against the USA.

title: Retired chaplain, 77, banned from wearing half-inch Christian cross while volunteering at a hospice
description: Retired businessman Derek Timms said he 'never received a single complaint' in the five years he has spent comforting terminally ill patients at the Solihull Marie Curie hospice in Birmingham.

title: Kirsty Young returns to Desert Island Discs for this year's Christmas Special after stepping down
description: Former Desert Island Discs host Kirsty Young, who stepped down from the role in 2018 due to long-term health concerns, will make a return as a guest for this year's Christmas special.

title: Protests erupt across China as thousands take to the streets over draconian Covid restrictions
description: Angry protests erupted across China yesterday as citizens took to the streets in a rare display of defiance over Beijing's draconian coronavirus restrictions.

title: Florida Russian family's kids YouTube channels earns them millions
description: A Florida-based Russian family's YouTube channel of their kids has netted them tens of millions of dollars and bought them a $12.5m Miami mansion, a Ferrari and a Range Rover.

title: Terrifying video captures moment a woman is hit by a car as it crashes through a cake shop window
description: This is the terrifying moment a silver Toyota Hatchback flew across a pavement before crashing into Kake Temptations in Batley, West Yorkshire, sending a customer flying across the bakery floor.

title: Trolls who encourage self-harm to face prison following campaign by tragic Molly Russell's family
description: Changes to the Online Safety Bill will see encouraging self-harm online made a criminal offence following a successful campaign by the Molly Rose Foundation

title: Matthew Guy resigns as Victoria Liberal leader after losing election to Daniel Andrews
description: Victoria Liberal leader Matthew Guy has resigned from his role after a humiliating upset to Daniel Andrews at the state election.

title: How the MOS - pilloried as 'alarmist' for exposing blood scandal - are set to be vindicated
description: The full story behind The Mail on Sunday's campaign to expose a scandal involving vulnerable patients given infected blood can be revealed today.

title: Neighbours cry foul over plans for an all-day music venue at Chelsea stadium Stamford Bridge
description: Chelsea FC have submitted plans to Hammersmith and Fulham Council for their Stamford Bridge stadium to become a live music venue selling alcohol between 10am and 11pm each day.

title: Junior RAF officer claims she was told to get an abortion following affair with Red Arrows commander
description: 'I was so frightened,' remembers the former RAF non-commissioned officer, an attractive woman now in her 40s, who at the time of the affair in 2017 was part of the Red Arrows' crew.

title: Fans blame England's draw on air conditioning being turned off an HOUR before kick-off
description: The air conditioning at the Al Bayt Stadium was switched off an hour before England's 10pm local time kick-off against the USA at the request of the FIFA-supplied operations manager.

title: A cri de coeur by the MoS medical reporter who broke the HIV blood scandal story 39 years ago
description: SUSAN DOUGLAS: Almost 40 years ago, in what became one of the greatest medical scandals ever, doctors were forced to make an unimaginable choice and sign the death warrant of 2,400 patients.

title: Call the Covid chief! Jonathan Van-Tam lines up role with the BBC's Midwives
description: Former Deputy Chief Medical Officer Jonathan Van-Tam is in talks with producers of the BBC's hit show Call the Midwife for a role in the next series after recently visiting the set.

title: King Charles' favourite actor Antony Sher leaves £2.3m in his will
description: Sir Antony Sher, who was one of King Charles's favourite actors, left nearly £2.3 million in his will. The Olivier Award-winning stage star had cancer and died aged 72 last December.

title: Migrants with suspected diphtheria moved from Manston centre to hotels around UK
description: Concerns grew after the Home Office yesterday confirmed that a migrant who died at the former military base in Kent last weekend had contracted the infection, which may have caused his death.

title: Top surgeon says sex-change breast removals are 'up tenfold in decade'
description: The number of sex-change breast removal operations carried out by a leading specialist has surged ten-fold in a decade, The Mail on Sunday has learned.

title: American child sex crime specialist reveals the things her children aren't allowed to do
description: The US child sex crime investigator has a list of five rules her children must follow in order to protect them from predators.

title: Nationals leader David Littleproud on why his party bucked trend and won key seats in Victoria
description: The Nationals' federal leader David Littleproud has praised his Victorian branch for its strong state election performance, but warned some 'soul searching' is needed in the Liberal party.
